trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated> event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制更新的記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs 物件會傳遞給事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷更新作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要存取更新記錄的索引鍵欄位值，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 原始及更新的非索引鍵欄位值可以使用存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會傳回所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性在更新作業之後。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式下，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs 類別的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> object contained in the `e` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>|Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|值`affectedRows`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|中包含的<xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName>物件`e`參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|初始化為`false`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>|初始化為`false`。 | > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式時引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> </xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception raised when the update operation was performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>表示在執行更新作業時引發的例外狀況。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If no exception is raised, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果不引發任何例外狀況時，使用<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>這個參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows property to determine the number of rows affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AffectedRows 屬性來判斷更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was updated.
trans-unit.target: 這個值通常用於驗證適當數目的資料列已更新。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得例外狀況 （如果有的話） 進行更新作業時所引發。

trans-unit.source: Use the Exception property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況屬性來判斷例外狀況 （如果有的話） 進行更新作業時所引發。

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生任何例外狀況，則這個屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果引發例外狀況，而且您決定要處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式，請務必設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`; 否則例外狀況會傳遞給下一個方法的呼叫堆疊上供處理。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that was raised during the update operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>表示更新作業中引發的例外狀況。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在更新作業期間引發的例外狀況已處理的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the ExceptionHandled property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當更新作業期間引發例外狀況時，可用於 ExceptionHandled 屬性表示是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，例外狀況處理，而且不會在呼叫堆疊進一步向上視為。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，例外狀況會傳遞給下一個方法的呼叫堆疊上供處理。

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>控制項在更新作業之後，應保持在編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會傳回所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性在更新作業之後。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Use the KeepInEditMode property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should remain in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用 KeepInEditMode 屬性來指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項應該仍會處於編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit mode, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式下，將此屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property should be used if you want to override the default mode at a specific occasion.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 應該使用這個屬性，如果您想要在特定情況覆寫預設的模式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control needs to remain in edit mode by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項需要維持在編輯模式中，依預設，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>後要保持處於編輯模式下更新作業。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the key field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含更新的記錄的索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the Keys property to access the values of the key field for an updated record.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的索引鍵屬性來存取更新的記錄的索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The Keys property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵屬性會傳回該物件會實作<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>介面。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 物件包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，請您也可以使用的索引子<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件來存取該欄位值直接。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含更新的記錄的索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含更新的資料錄的新欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the NewValues property to access the new field values for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用新值 屬性來存取新的欄位值更新記錄。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The NewValues property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: 新值 屬性會傳回該物件會實作<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>介面。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 物件包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，請您也可以使用的索引子<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件來存取該欄位值直接。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含更新的資料錄的新欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary that contains the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含更新的資料錄的原始欄位名稱/值組的字典。

trans-unit.source: Use the OldValues property to access the original field values for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 OldValues 屬性來存取原始欄位值更新記錄。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The OldValues property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: OldValues 屬性會傳回該物件會實作<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>介面。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the fields of the updated record.
trans-unit.target: 物件包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>物件，表示已更新資料錄的欄位。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >，請您也可以使用的索引子<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件來存取該欄位值直接。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含更新的資料錄原始欄位名稱/值組的字典。
